column5: Thanks for all the GOOD comments and support !!!!!      RFS
I think that TJ should give Randy a few hats and T-shirts for that plug on youtube. He doesn't have a sponsor but he sure has balls showing that on the internet. Very funny stuff Randy!!

I was on the river a few mornings ago and had The OFC hat on my head and the OFC Shirt on my back My camera was in my tackle box.  I put 2 and 2 together and ended up with 7.  Laugh at me if you want ... just be nice about it..  RFS
very nice!
lol awesome! almost sounds like u practised that speech at home one or twice before heading to the river..    lol
the acting job of setting the hook when the fish was on before the camera was on is hilarious
TJ owes you a cold one,just for the site plug. LOL

The fish bit and stole my leech ... I re-leeched and dropped it down as I was pressing the button. it bit again when i closed the bail ...  I have 2 more of these little vids .. where I press the "R" button just after the bite.. 13 walleye in 1 1/2 hours ... all about the same size   except for the ones I brought home.   RFS
I think it was yesterday that you sent me that Randy...I think it's GREAT!!!!! I watched it 3 times.... be happy cause I didn't even watch Ben-Hur 3 times.
holy crap ...lmao....talk about brown nosing ....lmao....
Shame on you.
"Don't go fishing without the net" Priceless!  Nice walleye man, nothing better than a fish on camera!  MTBF
Great job on the video Randy     I loved it Leechman
Great stuff!  Cheers.
Pretty good plug if you ask me! Like an extended Commercial you might see on WFN. Cheers
" don't go fishing without the net"..... great line...
That was fantastic (a little frightening perhaps) but fantastic! I can't get over having to throw fish like that back. You are both blessed and cursed. Thanks for sharing! Jim
GOOD on ya Randy!  Great vid for sure...
Randy, you're a rock star!!! Nice hat, too.
Good job!
Beautiful Randy! Good job on the fishing and the filming!
It is more than 3 hours long Roy.  Nice job Randy.
noice!!  Do that again, with a sturgeon...  cheers HD

Thanks Randy!!  Your gonna have to show me that spot...  Its funny how you can be soooo close to decent fishing and simply ignore it.  Thanks again for the support bud!!  Ya cant go fishing without the 'net!!
that was smooooooth Randy! Nice one!
Ontario Fishing Network presents.....Fishing with Randy from Sturgeon  Nice vid!
